one: ^Goodday Sir, may I please trade in this gold bracelet for a few coins.
^I do not trade with foreigners. Try another stall Lady.
^Please, I promise you this bracelet is worth it, even if it is from a foreigner.
^(Considers) Fine, I'll give you 150 gold coins and nothing else!
^Aunty Femi is asking for Bay leaves, Saffron, Anise, Sumac and Incense.
^For Femi? Fine! Here and there's your change foreigner!
^Nolwazi although infuriated, keeps her head an walks away with the Gold coins.
